website_summaries.verdict: Violet is a parent favorite for its cute, snuggly design and fun personalization. Great for kids from 6 months all the way to 3 years.
pros: Kids will love hearing their name and choosing new songs to learn
Violet connects to your computer through the LeapFrog Connect app to program your child's name, favorite things, songs, and more
With 30+ songs to download, kids won't get bored
The different buttons on her paws control power, songs, activities, and night mode
A great value for the price, especially considering the wide age range she appeals to
cons: A few users have had difficulty getting Violet to connect to their computer, but it seems to be an issue on the users' end

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade and not an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. This is a totally updated but much less quality version of the classic (4 yr old) version of Violet. This pup is not nearly as fluffy, as you can feel the battery box much more than the previous. Even more disappointing, as we were replacing a well-worn earlier version, is that you now can ONLY customize the child's name, color, and food and completely lost the options for choosing the songs played. A trait that was extremely well-used and refreshed with the older version. Why in thr world would Leapfrog take this functionality away???? Definitely a cheaper made product and certainly a downgrade. Why fix what isn't broken???
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: Vital toy for my son to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My son has used Scout's lullabies for years to fall asleep at night. He used it so much we had to get him a new one by the time he was 2. About the time he turned 4, we had to replace it again. He asked for Violet this time. Every single night for years. These are great toys. I love how you get to personalize the songs with your kids favorite food, colors, and name. I don't mind having to buy a new one every few years (usually it stops working due to the wires inside coming loose from being loved on so much)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Schran

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointed - spent 2 hours trying to personalize, used iphone 6, ipad mini, and desktop computer and cannot get past step 4. Sometimes it even downloads the software but Violet is stuck “I’m ready for the next step”. Will call customer service on Monday and probably return. So sad and so unhappy.🙁
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this puppy. It is cool that you can program things like my daughter's name, fav color, fav food, and fav animal into it. My only complaints are that the voice of the puppy is a boy's voice and it gives about 5 different "options" of what you want it to sound like when it says your child's name and all 5 sounded the exact same. Lame. Overall, a fun toy that my daughter loves to snuggle.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrito87

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use this seller again
customer_reviews.text: I received the item and it was already playing music in the box. That was the first sign there was a problem. The power button on the foot plays the lullabies that the other foot should control. The foot for the music doesn’t work at all which means there’s no way to turn it off. It randomly turns itself on about every 15 minutes. It was also dirty with black scuffs on it. I tried to return and sure enough it says there’s no returns. I didn’t realize that when I purchased it or I definitely Wild not have purchased from that seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Vinson-Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this dog has customization. There is a headphone plug near the battery case to plug in to a computer or phone. On the website, you can enter the child's name, favorite color, favorite animal, and favorite food. The dog calls your child by his/her name and even makes up songs and interactions with their favorites. There is a 5, 10, or 15 min bedtime music function. The buttons are really easy for small hands to push.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: The Best and Sweetest Toy on the Market
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is special needs and this is her fav toy. We have several.. you can program with your child's name and it has SWEET child's voice for all the cute phrases and counting, colors and songs not a harsh or weird voice like some toys. It's relaxing she falls asleep with it and carries it around nonstop. We actually have 7 I just checked. Also comes in green for boys or girls who prefer green. It is fantastic I hope they never change it. Perfect pricing, shipped instantly, perfect packaging, 5 Stars to the seller, the product and I will buy many many more. Give to any child any age they will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cabins and Canoes

customer_reviews.title: Not REALLY as described
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't have embroidered paws like the product description claimed. These aren't as nice as they used to be. I have one for my older daughter and she didn't want to pass it on to her baby sister, so I bought one. This second one doesn't have the button in the tummy and none of the paws are embroidered. They are all vinyl decals. I do like the way I can make changes with my phone, though. Much more convenient than attaching to the computer like with the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith - Sassy At Home

customer_reviews.title: Took some time to become a favorite
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter when she was 11 months. I thought it sounded like the coolest thing ever because it would talk to her/say her name. She wasn't interested at all. Now at 16 months it's one of her favorites. She loves to clap when Violet sings her favorite songs and she even gives Violet a hug when she asks for one. We have not used the sleep timer music but its a cool feature to have. I tried it one night but my daughter just kept pressing other buttons (paws) and it became more of a distraction than a calming lullaby.
customer_reviews.author: VGG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can add your child's name and her favorite things to the words Violet says. My daughter loves her Violet, she sleeps with her 15 minute music loop every night. Violet plays games, sings songs, and encourages your child to act out different animal sounds. She asks for hugs and plays music from two paws. I bought this for my 1 year old at Christmas, she is now almost 20 months and still loves her Violet.
customer_reviews.author: MyOwnSatelliteTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love this bear.
customer_reviews.text: I gift this bear to every little girl I know. The bear is great, but with this order I was disappointed. I purchase a new bear to be sent straight to the recipient as a gift. The bear arrived without the original packaging. Just the bear alone inside a card box, and it makes me think I just gifted an used bear. That was very ugly. Didn't like it at all. I buy a lot of things from amazon and this was a first for me, and I hope is the last time also.
customer_reviews.author: NCF

customer_reviews.title: The old my pal scout would guess pronounciations for unusual ...
customer_reviews.text: The old my pal scout would guess pronounciations for unusual or non-american names so you could tweak the spelling until it was correct. This new version will only use the names in the database. If I had known this, I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Older ones lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Violet for my first daughter that lasted 3-4 years. I then purchased a second for my youngest daughter. It lasted a few months before dying. We thought it was a defective one so we purchased another for her. Within a few weeks it was glitching up. It's a real shame because she absolutely loves the toy and we have always sworn by LeapFrog products.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Daniels

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't personalize with the first 3 devices I tried.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute dog with a cute voice. My grand daughter immediately loved it. I spent a lot of time trying to personalize her. Very frustrating and I considered returning her since the toy frequently says " go to leapfrog.com". I put in a help ticket with leapfrog which was useless. They did respond but didn't give any useful information. Finally on the 4th device (an older computer) it worked My grand daughter was in awe that her toy now calls her by name. It was worth the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: prissone

customer_reviews.title: Customizable, and higher-fidelity quality stuffed animal is especially good for kids who like cuddling with interactive toys.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift combo with the LeapFrog My Talking Pup laptop. Belly trigger stopped working pretty early for an unknown reason. Also it would be great to be able to record your child's actual name if it unique (which is the new trend). Songs are cute and catchy and children who like stuffed animals would undoubtedly enjoy it. My kids aren't into stuffed animals, but they still played with it a lot and we used the "5 minutes of bedtime music" a lot. Ages 1-4 would enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for bedtime!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters actual name is Violet. She’s about to be 2. That’s what actually caught my eye with this doll. It’s seriously such a lifesaver at night. The lullaby mode that you can control at 5, 10 or 15 min of music to play is the best. Every nap or bedtime I play it for her and she is soothed right to sleep. My 5 year old started to play with it so much we decided to buy her the green “Scout” one too, and she listens to the lullaby to fall asleep as well! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies learning to self soothe!
customer_reviews.text: Comes neatly packaged in an easy to wrap box that clearly stares what's inside. Everything you need is with the dog and it's super easy to set up. It helped my 15 month old when she was learning to self soothe at night as she would press the buttons and learned how to make it sign to her so we got one for our 3 month old. The seller shipped it in a timely manner and it came with no holes or dents in the box. I would highly recommend this seller and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE CHINESE JUNK, KEEPS BREAKING
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these over the last 5 years, not because we give them away, the wires inside keep breaking off the buttons in the paws. I fixed a couple of them before (unstuff the entire puppy and solder the wires back on) but with 4 children and one w/special-needs, I just don't have the time to make the repairs anymore. VERY CHEAPLY MADE. As it is now, this toy shouldn't be more than $5-10. I even notice less & less stuffing in each purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Cute but might kill you in your sleep
customer_reviews.text: Violet is customizable with their name, food they like, colors which is great; however her voice is usually higher pitched when speaking normal but when a customized entry is said the voice drops a couple octaves causing demon like tones to arise. Kid doesn't care and still loves her, 4 stars because setup was slightly more complicated than I like and now have to sleep with one eye open.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Best Child Gift
customer_reviews.text: Leap Frog products are almost all well made and excellent learning/fun quality. When I bought Violet I wasn't exactly sure what I was getting, but she is the one gift I thy to buy for all new babies first Christmas's. When you can program a soft stuffed toy to talk to your child and use their name it is just something that turns littles eyes wide in full amazement. Every night on the baby monitor in the crib my daughter learned what button to press fast to sing goodnight to her. EXCELLENT gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: The toy is fine, good durability even after a lot of flights on the floor. You can program the name of your child but only if the name is in the database and you can get also a different pronunciation. Then you can select also the favorite color and animal, but that's it, no other "programmable" features. Good songs, good interaction with the baby, but after few weeks you have been through all the combinations. I was expecting more ways to program the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Davide

customer_reviews.title: Every Child Should Have This Dog!!  Violet or Scout!!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with this Leap Frog Product! It so soothes a 1-2 year old to sleep by playing nite nite song's and using the Child's Name to Catch their Interest from the Start! I would buy this when the child turns one and put the baby to bed with Dog! My Granddaughter is on the way, but my Grandson who is 2 years old has had this since he was a1 year old. Now that he is 2 he goes to sleep with My Pal Scout for boys! It works 90 percent of the time just turn it on and leave the Dog to do the rest at Bedtime! Jewell,, TX
customer_reviews.author: Jewell A. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t say every kid’s name, music is great though.
customer_reviews.text: So, we got it because it was recommended and we were told it was programmable to our child’s name. If your kid’s name is unique in any way, it probably won’t say their name. They make it so you can choose a nickname but they only have like 20 or 30 of their choosing. Aside from this problem, this is a great toy. We use it for lullabies right now and it can play for either 5, 10 or 15 minutes of bedtime music. I wish it would say her name but I guess for 20 bucks it’s still a well made toy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H

customer_reviews.title: All fine and dandy until it quits working
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy until a few days ago. My 9 month old granddaughter loved it, treated it like a person. Now instead of the music, we just get a weird clicking sound or a sound like a scratched record. Tried to contact LeapFrog but no help yet. Too late to return. Really disappointed as I have always thought highly of LeapFrog products having used them for my daughter when she was a child. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hester Amey

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT KEEP SCROLLING
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! The product looks refurbished. My daughter was so excited to get this toy and it didn't work. The light turned on but no noise and I tried changing the batteries to make it work but it wouldn't! So disappointed in this company. I trust that when I am spending more for an item that i will get what I pay for but not in this case. Shame on whoever does quality control for this company, my daughter was so upset. Jerks lol!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Needs an update!
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully when they update this toy again they will use blue tooth technology. The only way to program this toy is through an auditory jack on a smart phone, which the iPhone hasn’t had for several version now. Luckily I had a special adapter from when iPhone first made the switch to their head phones plugging into the charging port and doing away with an auditory port...I shouldn’t have to buy additional equipment for a device to work. They really need to update this. Last updated in 2014...time again!
customer_reviews.author: HeartsOpenWide

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few days. Customizing it is sort of a pain because you have to get a screwdriver to open it up and you have to create an account online. Ours started making glitchy sounds, it will just stop working in the middle of a song. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Hmm...
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very disappointed because I bought an item that was listed as "like new" and a "collectible". I was surprised to see that it came without the original packaging and the USB cord. (I was also upset that the toy had a pen stain on the face...) BUT, it's a very cute toy and my daughter loves it. I wasn't expecting to get the older version, but it seems like there are more options for songs with this version. It also included my daughters actual name, which the newer version does not have. Ugg...disappointed, but my daughter's happy. That's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I can not get Violet programmed. Tried PC, iPhone... looked up troubleshooting... followed all directions. In researching I see other people have encountered the same issues. I'm extremely disappointed. OK - update. Unable to return device to Amazon because it has downloadable software. I called the product support line and the representative agreed the product was faulty and after following their email instructions they will send a new product to my home. Will update after I get the replacement up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Cord was not in the box--very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece and I just asked my brother how she liked that it says her name and he told me there was no cord in the box to connect to personalize the dog. My daughter had this when she was a baby and the fact that it said her name was her favorite part--and the reason I bought it for my niece! It says that the return window is closed on this item. I order a lot from Amazon and am so disappointed that this item was defective and I cannot get a new one. Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica U.

customer_reviews.title: Defective after VERY short time
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these since December. The first one was package free, that did not even last 2 months. The buttons all are glitchy and you cannot understand what ot's saying. The second was in a regular package and came with a defective foot button (the sleep music does not work at all) and Amazon will not return it. Now we are stuck with 2 non-working toys that our daughter cannot enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Mirandees

customer_reviews.title: Great companion!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second Violet my daughter has gotten. Violet is her BEST FRIEND. Beware, lesser common names are not available to be programmed with Violet or Scout. For example, my daughter Wren and son Casper’s names are not available. Do not leave Violet in a hot car as it does ruin the battery, which is why we’re buying a new one. My daughter carries her Violet everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Romanini

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedtime songs and lullabies.
customer_reviews.text: A great friend for a toddler, especially at night or nap time. I really liked that it could be programmed to “speak and sing” one grandchild’s name. However, it couldn’t pronounce the other child’s name since the spelling was uncommon. I wish it could have used a more updated software program to make that happen. Also, although you can turn the volume down a little, it was still too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Class Act

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute product! I love that you can connect your phone and log in to customize the babies name, and favorite food/color/animal. Because the iphone7 and up do not have headphone jack, you can use the lighting headphone dongle to do this step. Good song choices, a wide variety of types of music with a few sung by violet.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin Marie

customer_reviews.title: Violet, the huggable singing stuffed animal your girls will love!
customer_reviews.text: We got one Violet three years ago for our older daughter but when our younger daughter was born we bought another Violet. Even though they both say the same thing each one was customized to say our daughter's names. The dog tag lights up when the music plays. Each paw controls a different group of songs. It even has a lullaby song feature that plays for 5 or 10 minutes when you click on the back right paw. The girls love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tajima

customer_reviews.title: Works through Laptop download not phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bear! However, I had issues connecting the audio aux from the bear box to my galaxy s9 phone It would not connect. I had to connect it through my laptop. In the end the lap top downloaded the information to violet and ended up working.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Until it Breaks
customer_reviews.text: We've bought two of these, each of them have lasted less than 6 months. Support won't replace them outside of 90 days and just tells you to buy another one. You don't have an option because your kid loves them. Don't buy into the trap
customer_reviews.author: D. Shay

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Our son got Scout as a gift for his first Christmas, that version lasted over 5 years before having trouble with the buttons and needing to be replaced. When he learned he was going to be a big brother, he used his own money to buy Violet for his new sister. After 3 months, the buttons intermittently wouldn't work, and now (still less than 4 months), it does not work at all. Violet has been on a shelf next to the crib the whole time, with the buttons pushed once a day at bedtime, so it is not a case of rough play or overuse.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Love all of the features on this LeapFrog pal!!
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the features on this LeapFrog pal!! It's amazing to be able to adjust accordingly as the child ages. My 1 year niece absolutely loved it!! And you can personalize it to say the child's name! Although I wish you could adjust the pronunciation, as it was a little off but close enough. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: My princess loves this bear. She is 2 years old, and she knows when its time to go night night, its time to do it with this bear. Also, at one point, after Christmas, my wife dropped off a charging cord for me at work. This bear had fallen out of her van when I went out to get lovins from all the kiddos. It sat outside in the cold, in the Michigan Sub-Zero weather, and it still works just fine. We did have to replace the batteries after that, but that is to be expected I suppose. Either way, this little bear is my daughters favorite toy. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Green

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it play when your kid is hungry and everything will be great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new "purple puppy" and dancing to the songs. But if your kid is hungry, this toy will cause you endless trouble. It seems like the thing knows when the worst time would be, then plays every song about favorite foods and complains that it's hungry. I mean, great toy and all, but I'm constantly rushing over to hit the button before the thing says it wants a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: We got this for our daughter and they both love it. I love how you can customize it ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has Scout, the green “boy” version of this toy. He’s 3 now and still plays with him! We got this for our daughter and they both love it. I love how you can customize it for each child.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: We love our Violets!!
customer_reviews.text: We have the 1st generation Violet and our oldest daughter has always loved it! When I bought this one I noticed they had made some changes and was a little nervous about what they might be. Would they ruin a good thing?? No, they would improve! We love the new time setting on the right foot for night time. Our old one had the options of 2, 5, and 10 minutes. The new one has the options of 5, 10, and 15 minutes. We like the longer time for our daughter. They have also added some new songs, phrases. The BEST part was that I could personalize it DIRECTLY from my iPhone. Had it done in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: neals55

customer_reviews.title: My little girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My friends all started their babies off early with their Violet we decided to do so as well. Our daughter is 5 months and already loves hers!
customer_reviews.author: jks

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect gift, but I was beat to the gift finish line
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time picking out the perfect gift for my granddaughter for Christmas and this is truly perfect. Unfortunately, since her birthday is 2 weeks before Christmas - she got it for her birthday so I have to return my purchase. I will say that she fell in love with it immediately and interacts with it regularly throughout her day so it really is a great toy for a 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Snow

customer_reviews.title: I can only get scouts voice on violet.
customer_reviews.text: We have the smaller violet and decided to get the big one. I have reprogrammed multiple times and she only comes out with the whinny boy dog scouts voice. At first it made her cry. She loves the little violet dog this one she seems more interested in the tag than the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bed time!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've bought for my daughter after the first one became very old and dingy from Love. We love everything about violet especially the bedtime music. Ever since my daughter was a toddler, we put on the bedtime music after story time and she's asleep by the time it's over every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my daughter likes it so much
customer_reviews.text: as it says in the titie, my daughter started to like it after the first time using it, it can call my daughter's name and can be customized the voice features to make it share the same favorites with my daughter. Every time when it talks, my daughter starts smiling and i think she loves it very much
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Broken.  Corroded batteries.  Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: It was “new”, as in “still in the box”. However the batteries were corroded and it would not sync with the computer. Bought as a gift for a family member. Discovered this while setting it up before the birthday party so it would be ready to go. I ended up running to Walmart to get one that worked. Then wasn’t eligible for return on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: James Hosford

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: We got my son Scout last year, and got Violet for my daughter this year. Scout is perfect and has been working this whole time, just got a little piling on his fur. Its only been two weeks with Violet and her button for bedtime music is already not working. Disappointed, going to see if i can return.
customer_reviews.author: gaby granados

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about it is that you can program your ...
customer_reviews.text: This LeapFrog pal named Violet was for my youngest daughter for Christmas. We've had it for 6 years now and it has always answered in the same cheerful voice ever since we got it! The best thing about it is that you can program your child's name, favorite color, favorite food, and favorite animal! These features are really cool. You can also listen to lullaby's and other songs! One special feature about it is that it can sing a song spelling your child's name! My daughter actually learned to spell her name that way! Our whole family really loves this product and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: If it's not broke....don't fix it
customer_reviews.text: Lost 2 stars because their updated version is terrible compared to the ones from 3 years ago. You are forced to use their name list, if your child's name isn't there, too bad. Price was good until we realized it wasn't as user friendly as their older versions.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Walton

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with newer iPhone/iPad
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I bought an older version, but this is not compatible with any of my phones or tablets to customize... I have the one with the audio jack. It recognizes that it’s plugged in, but as it tries to customize, I keep getting the “something went wrong” message... and there isn’t any guidance from the manufacturer on what generation iPhone/iPad works. So upset that I won’t have this set up for my child’s birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but the older version was better
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has an older Violet model that allows you to pick and change the songs Violet sings. I purchased Scout for my son's birthday, and was disappointed to learn that I could no longer customize songs. Scout cannot sing Happy Birthday to my son like Violet can to my daughter. I also prefer the older Violet's speech- newer Scout is trying too hard to teach colors. ;) Newer Scout is very tightly stuffed with an oblong head- it was difficult to get his plastic pack back into his body. Violet is a bit softer, with a rounder head. Scout is still a fun toy, but I think the earlier version was better.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my niece and she immediately fell in love with it! One of the greatest features about this product is the ability to customize it and because my nieces name is unique that was an important factor to me!
customer_reviews.author: Shacoma Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Why worth it. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome and our grand Daugther just loved it.she's 1. We put her name in it and she just laughed and grabbed it and it started playing music for her. It will grow with her so It's really worth 20 dollars for sure... It's really clear and has all kinds of functions. Love it and will be getting her the others.
customer_reviews.author: Ejay

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Item is NOT as pictured. I purchased this one specifically because it pictured the hearts on its chest, which is supposed to have another button under it. The item I received did not have the orange hearts. I payed more thinking I was getting more. I could've picked this one up at Walmart for $14.95.
customer_reviews.author: T. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great toy at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I understood the great ratings this toy has the minute I saw it and played with it. Our 1-yr-old granddaughter is going to love it! Being able to personalize it by smart phone or computer makes this a toy unique to the child. Hearing the toy say their name is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves Violet
customer_reviews.text: My 5year old loves this. It was rather simple to set up and is mostly for helping her fall asleep. Music can be set to play for 5 10 or 15 minutes. I only wish that it could be a little more quiet. There are two volume settings. The volume is not an issue for my daughter and if I was so inclined I'm sure I could find a way to muffle it with little effort. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: YOUR INFO IS GIVEN TO HONG KONG`
customer_reviews.text: Right before the toy is synced with your child's name (you get on leap frog dot com to personalize) it asks to agree to privacy agreement & when I read it, it said your information is going to be given to Hong Kong. Why tho? When I unplugged my phone from the puppy a really loud alarm like sound went off from my iphone and the puppy started beeping with what sounded like a lot of static/white noise. This review has nothing to do with the seller but more so the product itself. I definitely DO NOT RECOMMEND this toy.
customer_reviews.author: gunes

customer_reviews.title: GRANDDAUGHTER  LOVES THIS BEAR 🐻
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU AMAZON, MY GRANDDAUGHTER ABSOLUTELY LOVES HER BEAR, SHE IS 1 1/2 yrs OLD AND LOVES IT SO SO MUCH ITS A GOOD GIFT FOR YOU FRIENDS OR LOVE ONES BOUGHT IT FOR A CHRISTMAS GIFT 💝 A GREAT BUY THANK YOU AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: james scribner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Opened the boxed and the toy smelled terrible. Looked clean though. I got Violet and it has the same voice as the boy dog Scout that my son has. But my daughter doesn’t seem to notice. Does not say her name even though we programmed it to say it, but it will spell it. Not impressed and the battery pack is almost too big to fit in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what you see!! Apparently there ...
customer_reviews.text: You don't get what you see!! Apparently there are 2 versions of Violet - I specifically orderd this one with the hearts on the belly- the one you see, BUT I got the other one! Very disappointing! It works, but still not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Her new Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My brother asked me to pick out a toy, for his Co workers, daughters 1st. Birthday. I picked this cute leapfrog toy. I am firmilur with their products and think they are great. And this more affordable version is wonderful. A great toy. And I'm very happy to say that its her Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.author: The Burlesons

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For All the Little Ones
customer_reviews.text: Both Scout, the boys version and Violet the girls version of this puppy have been great for our grandsons and our granddaughter and others who we continue to buy them for. They are able to snuggle them, listen to music while they fall asleep and I love that it says their names and their favorite things.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Winegard

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had the scout dog for my son and he loved it so I bought Violet for my niece and he also loves it . You can program baby name and favorite pet, food and she talk to you child and sings and asks for hugs . Aww it's so cute! Scout and violet say and sing the same songs . The night time button on the foot is a night time soothing music and you can get it for 5,10,15,20 minutes longer. Would definitely recommend for every mom and dad out there for your baby's first friend!
customer_reviews.author: keyonna twedell

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and cute toy for a great price. It can be programmed to say your child’s name and favorite color, food, and animal. I didn’t realize that when I purchased it. It was easy to program and our 7 month old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift for Baby's First Birthday!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even explain how much my son and daughter have both loved their Leap Frog Pals! Before we gave it to them, we upload their name so that they can hear it coming from the toy. That is so special! I have also gifted this as a first birthday gift to many of my nieces and nephews. It is always a hit and is very appropriately priced. It is a very good quality toy with nice sound, color and softness. I especially love the sleep feature where you can choose the length of bedtime music that plays. What a lifesaver. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BKSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great for day play, not a good self sooth tool
customer_reviews.text: I only dislike that there is no true ‘sleep’ feature to the dog. You can turn on lullabies and the pup makes a a snuggly bedtime friend - except the other paw buttons remain active. Even if baby rolls over onto one of the paws (most toddlers will purposely change the active paw) it will play upbeat music or ask funny questions. Great for engaging play during the day but horrible when you’re trying to get them to sleep. There ought to be a sleep switch in the back of the pup so parents can ensure that kids can actually sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Keister

customer_reviews.title: The hit of Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw Scout the green version of this leapfrog stuffed animal a few years back. I loved it for the fact that my friend that had it had a daughter with a very unusual name and Scout could say her name. Well fast forward a few years and our first grandchild is here... this is the first present I bought her. She will get many years of enjoyment out of Violet. And I know from my friends experience that Violet will be around for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love the bedtime music
customer_reviews.text: My daughter cant sleep without this teddy. It plays music for 3 different lengths of time and it smooths her back to sleep. Their are all sorts of other cool things it can do, like say ur name and your favorite food.. but she loves it for the music that puts her to sleep. It is our 2nd one and I hope they dont stop making them anytime soon ❤
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy and it calls them by name
customer_reviews.text: Its the best for putting baby down it plays music and you have your choice of 5 or 10 or15 minutes of bedtime music and my babies always fall asleep before it ends. A great thing for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Will not power on. I replace the ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Will not power on. I replace the batteries with no luck. Went to exchange and Amazon informed me that the item is ineligible for return. Asked Amazon rep via chat why that is and was told that it is non-returnable. Doesn't say this anywhere in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Hootis

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for little ones
customer_reviews.text: We have had a scout and a violet for years and we bought this for a gift for someone. I hope that the child loves it as much as our children have loved theirs over the years. They sing songs, are durable and don't give in to wear and tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: McDader

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my infant as a Christmas gift. She absolutely loves it, I love that you could personalize with her name and favorite things. My other kids get a kick out of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, great gift.
customer_reviews.text: We love this so much we have been purchasing them for all of our friends. It is an easy and quick set up, and it has multiple ways of pronouncing names, since most of our friends have foreign names this is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy, and I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy. Downloaded my daughter's name, favorite animal and food and regularly this "dog" says her name, sings her name, even spells it out in song, (and it's a 3 syllable name!) Large selection of songs, multiple phrases to talk to your child, bedtime music to settle them at night.... really really cute. She is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Peterson

customer_reviews.title: If your child's name is spelled a little different.... they give you options.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's easy to personalize. My daughter's name is spelled a bit differently and it gave me the option to spell it out.... and for this puppy to say it correctly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kornahrens

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I got scout for my son so I had to get violet for my daughter. The songs are the same so my son remembered some of them and my daughter loves dancing to violets music. Love the personalization.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: My son really seems to enjoy his Scout
customer_reviews.text: My son really seems to enjoy his Scout. I'd give it five stars except for one glaring issue -- literally. The light on his chest (under "SCOUT" in the picture) is *bright*. So when my son tells Scout to play bedtime music at night, it flashes a few times and lights up the entire room. Just like my daughter with her Violet, my son will turn the music on in the middle of the night if he wakes up, and the very bright light just wakes him up more. For some reason this seems to be particular to the light used on Scout -- the Violet that my daughter has isn't nearly as bright.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Customizable!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our three-month old for Christmas (will be five months by then) and set it up to say her name. Super cute! Love how it is customizable to the child, great quality, and part of the LeapFrog line of educational toys.
customer_reviews.author: kcotton4166

customer_reviews.title: Great little dog.
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves this. My only complaint is that the box is hard to get inside once you program it. Besides that it is very nice love that you can personalise it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable Replacement for Older Model
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement (first one succumbed to the flu and wasn't able to come completely clean). This one that arrived must be a 2nd generation(?). It was easy enough to program, but doesn't offer as many programmable options as the first model we had, just name, color, animal, & food. With the previous one we were able to add favorite songs as well. My 22 month old presses the paw looking for her favorite song and it's not there on this model. If you're not used to the first gen Violet, then this one is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: kauzs

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. Violet has helped put my daughter to sleep every night since she was a year old. The sleep button quit working and we had to buy a new one. My daughter still plays with both of them and she is 5 now. My only complaint is that the battery pack is really big and was difficult to get in the back and close the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Baby
customer_reviews.text: One of my nieces has a Violet which she rarely puts down. That prompted me to get one as a baby shower gift for my cousin and at the moment, she's just playing the lullaby for her newborn. As the baby gets older, I'm sure she'll love it as much as my niece does.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Came in a plastic bag in the box but it looks just like the picture and it came with batteries so that was nice. But if you are getting as a gift leave in the box for wrapping purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L. Hornkohl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my six month old niece and she loves violet! I was able to program it before I gave it to her. Programming is super easy and fast, took less than 10 minutes. This is a very engaging toy. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ACMNEKO

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this toy for my daughter! This toy arrived on time and you could quickly see the quality is this toy. There is multiple ways this toy can interact with your child. My daughter has been playing with this toy none stop. She has really put this toy to the test lol. I really feel like this toy is put to last! I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Derek R.

customer_reviews.title: This is my default 0-3 gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received Scout for her first birthday. She will be 4 in March and she STILL plays with Scout. It's great that you can program it to say your child's name, favorite food, favorite animal, etc...AND, you can modify the settings as your child grows and their tastes and favorites change. Plus--in these three years, I have yet to change the batteries! --Another plus is that even though this toy does make potentially-annoying sounds, it's easy to just pinch the foot to turn it off. --One of my favorite features is the 2, 5, or 10 minutes of bedtime music option. Anytime I need a gift for a 0-3 year-old, boy or girl, I buy Scout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grand Daughter's Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter has loved her Violet from the second she unwrapped it. Sleeps with it every night and plays the songs over and over. We have a grandson coming in March 2019 and we will be getting him the boy version.....Scout. Great quality and oh so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the old version
customer_reviews.text: This version doesn’t seem as nice as the old one that my nephew had. It won’t say my daughter’s name (apparently Quinn is unusual) and it cannot to phonetically programmed to do so. Still cute but doesn’t have all the old customizations available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not hook up correctly
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy and great ideas for the learning and interaction it provides. Ours would never set up correctly so I returned it. I’m bummed because it seems like a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We were gifted a Pal Violet for my newborn daughter, and she slept with it every night for 5 years, When the music feature stopped working, she was devastated, and I bought her this new one. What a disappointment! First, you can not customize it nearly as much, but we could live with that. Secondly, the battery box is so big, it doesn't stay in the back very well, and was always falling out. But the worst is that is completely stopped working after two months! It kept asking us to reconnect to the computer, but when we did, it made a loud static noise and would not update.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stricklen

customer_reviews.title: Terrific electronic toy
customer_reviews.text: I am not into buying electronic toys for wee ones, but saw this and took another Grandma/Nana's advice-posted on Amazon. Violet is wonderful. She speaks like a human and pronounces my 1 yr old grandbaby girl's name as I do. She was one earlier this month. I have shown her Violet on facetime and she almost crashed her Mom's computer the first time trying to find her! The next time she realized-perhaps-that these were the folks she could not touch but need a 3rd opportunity before we determine that. Nonetheless, a great toy. Sings songs and has conversations re what the child likes. Delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Tyke

customer_reviews.title: Literally comes in a box. And ready to go
customer_reviews.text: The best investment for having little kids I have found purely by accident granted I use mine for bedtime... three different settings for bed time and you set it and forget it as well as different volume levels and you can even program it to say your child's name
customer_reviews.author: Freight_train 53

customer_reviews.title: Really is a good Pal
customer_reviews.text: Could only make selections from a list but the options were good enough for a baby. Eg. Favorite color, favorite pet, nickname. For one of the songs, Violet spells out the baby's name so that is the most you get to personalize it. Overall really cute and collar lights up red which I think is great for nighttime/bedtime on the eyes. Super cuddly and babies love this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Fairytale Love

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your sanity!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ridiculous! It could be a great toy....if it worked. We got our first one through Amazon by the first of February for my childs first birthday. It lasted a month and started glitching out. They did return it for a new one...however! Now the new one is glitching out and we've hardly used it, but it's past the return date. DO NOT BUY, it's not worth your time or money... Let alone the sanity of your child that doesn't understand why their to is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the toy but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: There should be options to control volume without pulling out the back. Thought it was a bit bigger in pictures. It could not learn my child's name. I love it still
customer_reviews.author: Snovia

customer_reviews.title: My go-to baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: My nieces both LOVED their "Baby Tad" when they were little. My sister used the lullabye with a timer on one of the paws to put my nieces to sleep ALL the time. The updated "Violet" (for girls) and the "Scout" (for boys) is now my go-to baby shower gift. They both fortunately still have the lullabye timer on the paw. And now you can program the baby's name. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT FROM ANY SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Broke a month in , no longer talks. I then purchased a second one because my granddaughter loved it so much. Did the same thing. It's starts skipping after after a few notes and that's all it does. Don't buy this product. If I purchased two in a row that had the same glitch then I am going to guess that all of them could have the same glitch.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Ann Donato

product_meta.title: LeapFrog My Pal Violet
product_meta.description: Color:Violet| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLeapFrog My Pal Violet
feature_bullets: Teach Violet your child's name and favorite things for personalized learning in 15+ activities
Listen along to 40+ learning songs, melodies and lullabies, for active daytime fun and nighttime soothing
Teaches first words, feelings and emotions, colors and counting
Connect Violet to your smart phone, tablet or computer for easy personalization while she's still in the box
This cuddly pal is recommended for children ages 6-36 months

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,437 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
